routes.description: Orders API v1 - Main orders endpoint
Customers API v2 - New customer endpoints with enhanced features

changeRequests.title: Add rate limiting to /api/orders endpoint
changeRequests.description: Implement rate limiting to prevent abuse of the orders API endpoint

changeRequests.title: Update authentication policy for payments service
changeRequests.description: Enhance authentication requirements for PCI compliance

changeRequests.title: Add new route for customer API v2
changeRequests.description: Deploy new customer API version to UAT environment

changeRequests.title: Modify downstream path template for inventory
changeRequests.description: Update inventory service routing to new backend structure

changeRequests.title: Enable caching for customer endpoints
changeRequests.description: Reduce backend load by caching customer data
